channel.title: Ssh on 小楼一夜听春雨
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on 小楼一夜听春雨

item.title: linux 关闭SSH 连接用户
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 1.查明登陆端口； 1 2 3 $ who root pts/1 Apr 8 00:06 (172.29.0.29) root pts/2 Apr 8 04:15 (172.29.0.21) 2.通知该用户将要关闭他： 1 $ echo "I will close your connection" > /dev/pts/2 这样他的终端将显示该信息。 3.关闭用户连接

item.title: ssh登录时如何直接在参数中加入登录密码
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: sshpass: 用于非交互的ssh 密码验证 ssh登陆不能在命令行中指定密码，也不能以shell中随处可见的，sshpass 的出现，解决了这一问题。它允许你

item.title: Ssh Login
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: faq 报错：Too many authentication failures 1 2 3 4 5 tom@tom-w10vbud16:~/ztom/bits/pem$ ssh -i vachain_competition.pem ubuntu@ec2-13-125-197-97.ap-northeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com Received disconnect from 13.125.197.97 port 22:2: Too many authentication failures Connection to ec2-13-125-197-97.ap-northeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com closed by remote host. Connection to ec2-13-125-197-97.ap-northeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com closed. tom@tom-w10vbud16:~/ztom/bits/pem$ If you are not using any ssh hosts configuration, you have to explicitly specify the correct key in the ssh command like so: 1 ssh -i some_id_rsa -o

item.title: Mac上SSH-Key对应多个github账号
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: Mac 上SSH-Key对应多个github账号 当然, 也不单是github帐号, gitlab或者其它账号都是可以的哟… 前言 因为最近在
